data.comment: Sheffield Wed kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Callum Paterson scores to make it 1-0 at Hillsborough Stadium.
In the minute 40, Sheffield Wed take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Liam Shaw.
George Saville (Middlesbrough) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Sam Morsy for Middlesbrough has been booked by Geoff Eltringham and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, Barry Bannan (Sheffield Wed) gets a yellow card.
The second-half has commenced. Middlesbrough with the kick-off.
In the minute 49, Duncan Watmore strikes to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Hillsborough Stadium.
Marcus Tavernier is on a sub for Lewis Wing for Middlesbrough.
The away team replace Britt Assombalonga with Chuba Akpom.
In the minute 71, Isaiah Brown is replacing Callum Paterson for the home team.
Middlesbrough make their third substitution with Marcus Browne replacing Marvin Johnson.
The home team have replaced Josh Windass with Matthew Penney. This is the second substitution made today by Neil Thompson.
In the minute 88, Neil Warnock (Middlesbrough) is making a fourth substitution, with Djed Spence replacing Anfernee Dijksteel.
That's full-time at Hillsborough Stadium. The final score is 2-1.
